TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 287,000 to 295,000 head versus 292,000 week ago and 322,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 124,000 to 128,000 head versus 129,000 week ago and 134,000 a year ago. Reuter
